website_summaries.verdict: Fully adjustable driver, so you can dial in the correct loft and weight for your particular swing.
pros: Club head can be adjusted to 4 different degree settings
Extremely lightweight design so you can generate a lot of club head speed for maximum distance
Materials in the club face are very forgiving for off-center ball strikes
cons: More expensive than some other drivers
Doesn't have all the newest technologies

customer_reviews.title: Hit 6 times on the range before it broke!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was horrible. I hit this club on the range a total of 6 shots before the head flew off. The shaft broke off at the head. I travel a lot with my job and have been out of town since this happened and haven’t had a chance to have it replaced yet. I’m hoping that Amazon or TaylorMade makes this purchase right! If not, it will be my last golf club purchase using Amazon Prime. UPDATE: I called TaylorMade and they corrected my situation without question. My new shaft is in the mail. I’ve hit TaylorMade drivers for years now and this was the one and only problem I’ve had with any of their equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility + Distance
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility of this club especially the fade/draw adjustment. I bought the 12 degree version (Hank Haney's influence). But it can adjust up to 14 degrees and down to 10 degrees which is nice flexibility. I had the R15 but the M1 feels much more powerful. I also carry the R15 which I've adjusted upward to 14 degrees and play it like a big fairway metal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great driver at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The M1 is a great driver all around. I love how you can adjust the draw/fade and height settings on the driver manually by using the tool (included). I'm a beginner golfer so getting a two year old driver like this at a fraction of the original price is just as good as buying the latest driver from Taylormade.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marion II

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Received a used M1 w an after market grip and wrong dexterity shaft--actually the shaft is from a R1! Used headcover and no tool!
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Skrabalak

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new one but I got it used !damage shaft !Not head cover and tool !
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent driver at a great price. Equal is distance to my Callaway Epic.
customer_reviews.author: SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Wrong club delivered
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Taylormade M1 driver and got an M2 driver. I guess this should be an upgrade but I really wanted the M1. I’ll try it out and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good club, seller leaves something to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Club is fine, rating is for seller. Club arrived without head cover or tool to adjust weights
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver
customer_reviews.text: Moved from a Taylormade SLDR driver to this model. Add at least 20 yards to my drives when hit correctly by the operator.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sweet spot, what would be mis-hits on other clubs are still quality shots.
customer_reviews.author: Brent McKee

customer_reviews.title: Not a game changer
customer_reviews.text: Like the club but, as a 9 handicap player, it made very little difference from my older taylormade R1 despite the advertisements. It came without the wrench and headcover.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Golf driver is everything I expected. Delivery perfectly on time as forecasted by Prime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BOOM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do you like distance? Push the weights all the way forward and adjust the loft down for Monster Mode! The ball never knew what hit it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowe

product_meta.title: TaylorMade 2017 M1 Men's Driver 460cc
product_meta.description: Same letter. Better everything. The all-new M1 driver takes multi-material construction to the next level to deliver distance, forgiveness, and complete personalization. Featuring a new 6-layer carbon crown and additional carbon toe panel, the 2017 M1 driver has 43% more carbon than last year's model. The additional focus on multi-material construction saves weight to enable lower CG for better launch conditions and allows for an expanded T-Track for improved adjustability.
feature_bullets: Redesigned t-track System with longer Track and more moveable weight
Three premium Stock shafts, with 30+ after-market no-upcharge shaft options
New ultra-lightweight, aluminum, 4 loft sleeve with 12 settings
4 degree aluminum Loft Sleeve features 12 easily adjustable settings to dial loft and face angle without going to a golf shop
